attributes.title: Get him out of office
attributes.review: We all know that Donald trump is racist, sexist, xenophobic, a rapist, and basically should've never been in office. The man never had any experience beforehand in politics and wasn't even that great a businessman. Just take a look at what his leadership has done with COVID-19, while every other country has descending cases we are the only country rapidly increasing in cases and people are still ignorant and brainwashed under his control. Even if you don't care about anything but white people, know that he is turning America into a fascist state. This is my first time voting and I'm definitely using it to get him out of office!

attributes.title: Who is this man?
attributes.review:
I saw that this app had very low reviews so I decided to check it out, but when I opened the app I saw this horrible racist man as the background. I was APPALLED. I thought to myself what is this app even about that could involve such a disgusting man? Apparently the app is all about supporting this man. That is why I had to leave a 1 star rating. 
(P.S I would have gave it a 0 if possible)

attributes.title: Unbelievable!
attributes.review:
I am 56 years old and I love our president. I downloaded this app in support of trump and his campaign but I am utterly disappointed!! 

Right after downloading the Trump 2020 app my chicken started to uncontrollably shake and recite the entire bee movie script! I want to support my favorite president but I cannot continue to use this app for obvious reasons! I will not be downloading any of trumps apps anytime in the future. My precious chicken had not recovered since and every now and then shakes as if the devil has taken over him. Thank you trump for everything you have done to this nation. I support you, but not your app. ğŸ˜¡
